channel.title: Help please and please read
channel.description:
i have got a attack on my computer and placed some kind of virus (they also say i downloaded some virus) (thats what my internet suplier ROGERS says) by some one and my internet company suspended my modem so no connection would be made then they told me to re format my comp which i did after that they re connected to my internet also they warned me if this continue futher and if i don't have good security for my computer they will suspend my account for 1 week or maybe terminate my account (so no more internet and also they wouldn't reconnect my computer to the internet if i don't agree to that)
that why can some one recommand me some free good anti virus fire wall spy bot destroyer programs please help also i alredy just have downloaded adwarer se personal (if you guys can help me out it would be great)

item.title: Help please and please read
item.dc:creator: @lilshu lilshu
item.description:
@lilshu wrote:

Yeah, I read the topic and new it was that book.

Try and do a chronological examination of how the boy’s amount of savagry increases as the events happen on the island.

Pretty much must include Piggy’s death somewhere in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please and please read
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

guys away from my other question i got another one for my english homework if you can define it it would be great (please don’t flame at me i don’t understand what it means just asking for help)

" examinethe boys decline into savagery as it reveled by the human deaths and the attemped murder"

what does it mean i think it means how they boys became savages by event or i’m not sure (its a essay for lord of the flies)

Read full topic
